title: Bug 10654: Unable to Add All Jars in a Folder to Build Path
description: When adding jar files to the build path using classpath variables, you have to specify each jar file separately, even if there are several in the same directory.
OB: When attempting to add multiple jar files from the same directory to the build path using classpath variables, the system requires each jar file to be specified individually.
EB: The expected behavior is to allow users to add all jar files in a specific folder to the build path simultaneously using classpath variables.
SR:
1. Open the project in the IDE.
2. Navigate to the build path configuration.
3. Add a classpath variable pointing to a folder containing multiple jar files.
4. Attempt to add all jar files from the folder to the build path.
5. Observe that each jar file needs to be added individually.
